response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and efficiency of your operations. The product is valued at $1,000,000 by you, and I am confident it will provide substantial returns on investment. Considering its exceptional quality and market demand, I am extending this exclusive offer to you at a special price of $950,000. This is a unique chance to secure a high-value asset at a competitive rate. I look forward to discussing the details further and understanding how we can collaborate to achieve mutual success. Please let me know if you require any additional information or have questions about the product or the offer.", "product_price": 950000}
